scripts.dev: mkdir dist; npm run manifest:FIREFOX; webpack -w --mode development
scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox; npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:all:clean: npm run build:firefox; npm run build:chrome; npm run clean
scripts.build:firefox: webpack --mode production; npm run manifest:FIREFOX; BROWSER=FIREFOX ts-node scripts/make-dist-zip.script.ts; npm run clean
scripts.build:chrome: webpack --mode production; npm run manifest:CHROME; BROWSER=CHROME ts-node scripts/make-dist-zip.script.ts; npm run clean
